minions.name: Killer Queen
minions.description: Talent: If you played another minion here this turn, place a +1 power counter on this minion and that minion

minions.name: Drone
minions.description: Place a +1 power counter on this minion. Ongoing: Before one of your minions is destroyed, you may remove a +1 power counter from this minion to prevent the destruction

minions.name: Soldier
minions.description: Place two +1 power counters on this minion. Talent: Transfer a +1 power counter from this minion to another minion

minions.name: Worker
minions.description: Place two +1 power counters on this minion

actions.name: Gimme the Prize
actions.description: Place a +1 power counter on up to 3 of your minions

actions.name: We Will Rock You
actions.description: Each of your minions gains +1 power for each +1 power counter on it until the end of the turn

actions.name: A Kind of Magic
actions.description: Transfer any or all of your +1 power counters among your minions

actions.name: Headlong
actions.description: Move one of your minions to another base. Place two +1 power counters on that minion

actions.name: The Show Must Go On
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: Your minions here with +1 power counters are not affected by other players' cards

actions.name: Under Pressure
actions.description: Special: Before a base scores, you may transfer any number of +1 power counters from one of your minions to another

actions.name: We Are the Champions
actions.description: Special: After this base scores, transfer any or all +1 power counters from one of your minions there to another minion

actions.name: Who Wants to Live Forever?
actions.description: Remove any number of +1 power counters from your minions. Draw a card for each counter removed
